institution: Shiv Nadar Institute of Eminence (Deemed to be University), Delhi–NCR, India
points: Investigating epigenetic and mechanical regulation of the cutaneous wound response, with a focus on wound-induced regulation of DNMT3a.
Working extensively with primary mouse keratinocytes to study mechanotransduction-driven nuclear localization and function of epigenetic regulators.

institution: BRIC–Institute for Stem Cell Science and Regenerative Medicine (inStem), Bengaluru, India
points: Studied mechanoregulation during the cutaneous wound healing response using primary cells, cell lines, and mouse models.
Hands-on experience with mouse colony management and advanced cell biological, biochemical, fluorescent microscopy, and genetic engineering techniques.
Investigated the role of the extracellular matrix protein Mindin in skin fibrotic conditions (Journal of Investigative Dermatology, 2023).
Studied antimicrobial peptide–mediated antiviral responses to SARS-CoV-2 (Frontiers in Immunology, 2023).
Explored maintenance of epithelial stem/progenitor states via autocrine matricellular signaling (Cell Reports, 2022).

institution: ICAR–National Institute for Plant Biotechnology, New Delhi, India
